website_summaries.verdict: This 2-in-1 kitchen tool features a smoke infuser and a vacuum sealer in one compact size.
pros: Has three smoke levels to vary smoke intensity
Ships with a number of accessories
cons: USB charging may affect this option if you travel with it
Does not ship with wood chips

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works better than anticipated. I have a large smoker for meat. This works great for cheese. Also used on some pork loin that I pressured cooked. It was very good and very smoky. Extremely impressed with the amount of smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Surprising how strong a smoked taste can be achieved by such a small device in such a short time!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gun. We live in a condo, so a regular full size smoker isnt an option. However, having used this gun, it is surprising how strong of a smoked taste can be infused in just a few minutes! My advice is to just go a few minutes the first couple of times. It only takes a small pinch of wood chips. Be sure to get the wood shavings type made for these type of smokers. We ordered a three cup pack of different flavored chips when we ordered this item. That will be enough for years!
customer_reviews.author: James M. Stanovic

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This smoke infuser is an absolute HIT with our customers! Our staff love experimenting with a variety of flavors in wood chips & herbs and incorporating them into the menu, at our Deli & Grill! The machine itself is so easy to use and works FAST, which is very important to us during the morning rush and then the busy lunch hours. HAPPY with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Umar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money !!!
customer_reviews.text: Smoking gun is very powerful and it has 3 speeds to control the intensity. I was also very impressed by the vacuum seal function. Very convenient to have only one appliance with the function of both!

customer_reviews.title: Sent me a used/returned product
customer_reviews.text: Just received 10 minutes ago, opened raggedy box and discovered NOT NEW. User manual missing, the packaging tray was replaced upside down in box, unwrapped usb cord, out-of-place tweezers. Was it returned because didn't work? If I pay full price, I expect brand new product with everything in the box in its place from manufacturer. Not happy I was sent a previously used/returned product! This is meant for a gift, and it's embarrassing because it's obvious that it's not new...packaging looks like came from a garage sale.

product_meta.title: NIA 2-in-1 Professional Smoking Gun Cold Smoker & Vacuum Sealer - Rechargeable Handheld Smoke Infuser - Excellent Gift for Chefs
product_meta.description: Combining both a Smoking Gun & a Vacuum Sealer, our handheld smoker is the PERFECT accessory for Professional/Home Chef and Mixologists alike. It’s a compact, portable, handheld device, used right in the comfort of your own home! This Smoking Gun is a handy alternative for that authentic Smoke House flavor. Achieving that flavor with the traditional method is a daunting, time-consuming—not to mention extremely expensive task, which requires culinary expertise. However, this smoking Gun will provide you the ability to skip all the hassle and guess work; yet achieve deep smoky flavors and aromas to your food in minutes, all while going easy on the budget.You'll be amazed at the professional results. The possibilities are endless for any & every type of cuisine. Since it uses only cold smoke to penetrate your choice of food, it will not further cook, reheat, or change the texture at all. There is no need to presoak the wood chips & you’ll love to experiment with different spices, herbs, teas, hay, or dried flowers. This device is quieter than ever and weighs just over a pound. Offers 3 varying speeds for precise control over flavor intensity. To use, just add the preferred flavor smoke chips, switch it on and light with a lighter/match. The extender hose will infuse smoke directly to your food sealed container or resealable bag. To use vacuum sealer function, simply switch the hose & follow instructions provided to remove all traces of air from the resealable bag. Preserved food can be saved for months in the freezer without freezer burns & intact with its freshness & flavor. Even save & seal prepared meals, leftovers or fresh produce in the fridge! To clean, disassemble without any use of tools, wipe with a damp cloth. Burn chamber is dishwasher safe. 1-year manufacturer's warranty.
